string.value: Cassandra has something to talk to you about. What could she want?

Cassandra says that she's decided to raise a Mini Dragon as a way of commemorating the launch of Dragon Master Evan. But she says that she doesn't think she will do a good job and asks that you take care of the Dragon Egg for her. She says that if you #bhatch the egg by taking good care of it for 1 hour#k, she will give you a nice gift... \r\n\r\nIf the egg disappears because you log out, forfeit the quest and accept it again.
Cassandra seems to be raising a Mini Dragon in order to commemorate the launch of Dragon Master Evan. She is planning to hatch new Dragons from #bMarch 31 to May 4#k, so keep helping her until then.

It looks like you haven't hatched the Dragon Egg yet. If you take care of it for #babout 1 hour#k, it will hatch for sure! If you disconnect, the egg will disappear so be careful! If the egg has disappeared, forfeit the quest and accept it again!
